alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Somerset and central Middlesex Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kendall Park, or near New Brunswick, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Brunswick, Somerset, Old Bridge, East Brunswick, South Brunswick, North Brunswick, Jamesburg, Millstone, Dayton, Kendall Park, North Brunswick Township, Whittingham, South River, Highland Park, Spotswood, Milltown, Helmetta, Monmouth Junction and Heathcote. This includes New Jersey Turnpike between exits 9 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
